name: Robot Duck
description:
Get ready for random chaos in this colorful 2D platforming mini-arcade game where you play as a fine feathered cyborg shooting enemies and trekking through prodeurely generated levels as you make your way to earning a trophy!

Made for the 'Finally Finish Something 2019 Game Jam' by Second Dimension Games, this has been a small class assignment of mine that I wanted to improve on and was later turned into an ongoing passion project. I have been working on this one for over a year now and even though I still have plans on adding little more in the future, I hope yall enjoy this fully functional minigame and don't be afraid to leave some feedback. Thank you and enjoy the glory that is Robot Duck.
